text: Morgantown is a city in and the county seat of Monongalia County, West Virginia. It is located on the banks of the Monongahela River. It is known as the home of West Virginia University. It had a population of 30,347 per the 2020 U.S. Census. Morgantown is the largest city in North-Central West Virginia. The Morgantown metropolitan area had a population of 140,038 in 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * City of Morgantown, West Virginia Category:Cities in West Virginia Category:County seats in West Virginia
title: Morgantown, West Virginia
